projects.name: Mosam
projects.description: mosam is a weather forcasting application. All it's accuracy based on the API data provided py openWeather, this app make you update about weather changes along with giving push Notification

projects.name: Doge San
projects.description: Doge San is a small app that allows you to watch your favorite anime shows on your android device. It has a very low memory footprint and works off the Anime1 server. The app scrapes the site and provides a pleasant mobile anime viewing experience. Unlike other apps, this does not contain any ads and is distributed for free.

aboutme: I am a full-Stack Developer that comes from a self taught background. Through my past experiences, I can balance the need of users to understand their pain points and how I can contribute as a developer and solve their problems.
I've worlked with a wide range of peopel.This has enabled me to adapt and become flexible in the workplace.
